text: Ðis synd þa landgemæro æt Wenbeorgan stigandes bisceopes.
Of þan stapole stent innan scocera wege.
Swa innan þa wogan dice.
Of þære wogan dic.
Innan beh hilde sloh.
Of beh hilde sloh uppan beordune.
Of beorhdune to wullafes stane.
Of wullafes stan andlang cumbes innan hlydan æwylmas.
Swa andlang hlydan innan þo ham dic.
Of þære ham dic innan þa heafod stoccas.
Of þam heafod stoccan.
Innan dorcan swa andlang streames innan þa ealdanig dic.
Swa andlang dic innan smitan stream.
Swa andlang streames on easteweard lilles ham up in þane blacan pyt.
Of þan blacan pytte on midde wyrð þane mære on þæne stan.
Of þam stane innan þa holan wannan.
Of þære holan wannan up on icen hilde weg on þæne hæðenan byriels.
Of icen hilde wege innan þa cwealm stowe.
Of ðere cwealm stowe innan swyrd æceras heafod on þonam hwitan pyt.
Of þam hwitan pytte innan þa twegen stanes on mortan cumbæ.
Of mortan cumbe andlang þes wogan hlinces.
Of þam wogan hlince innan þa catt hola.
Of þam catt holan innon þone crundel.
Of þam crundele innan folces dic.
And swa eft in on þone stapol.
